content.text: Mordor. The one place in Middle-Earth we don't want to see any closer. And it's the one place we're trying to get to. It's just where we can't get. Let's face it, Mr. Frodo, we're lost.

I know, and it is impossible to overstate, how lucky I am to have had these experiences. From the very beginning, with recruiters and interviewers willing to take a chance on me; to the internships themselves, where co-workers did such an amazing job

To all those who have messaged or connected with me on LinkedIn: I thank you for reaching out, and I apologize if I was not able to get back to you. I receive many requests for advice, insights, and referrals, and it is difficult to address them all
